description:
Suicide Guy and Suicide Guy: Sleepin' Deeply for the first time together in a mega bundle!

Set in the incredibile and extraordinary dreams of its protagonist, this time you'll have to save not 1, but 2 beers.

Features:

• 25 + 7 levels for hours of fun!
• Physics based levels
• Ultimate moves: be able to pick up items, throw them, activate mechanisms and even burp.
• Funny creatures to annoy
• Vehicles to drive

This time, to wake him up you'll need all your skills.
Despite the title, the game is NOT at all about suicide or depression.
name: Suicide Guy Collection
